ecause one

ching

For example, the representative can be recomputed every generation,=

a process where all members mate into one single individual which

omes the representative of the species. All genes should be allowed 
to be =
inherited in an iterative process resulting in a genome that

omplexity of all individuals of the species. Can this be 
considered a good=
 representative? Or maybe just regular mating, where 
excess/disjoint genes=
 are inherited from more fit members. I don't

have. And it is important that the weights

raged during mating.

The idea is that the representative of a species can =

tance.
